author: m.kalinin
content: The complexity of the merge mostly comes from the consensus swap. Which involves a new type of client and related infrastructure changes, shift in the community caused by re-understanding how does Ethereum work, some technical changes in opcodes and sync algorithm, communication protocol between eth1 and eth2 nodes, etc.

author: m.kalinin
content: The beacon chain part of the work is relatively easy to do. What is the benefit of making it even more simple?
